name: Super Turbo Turkey Puncher 3
description:
Was bored, so decided to try and replicate the "popular" mini game in the Doom series, Super Turbo Turkey Puncher 3!!!

Can be played in browser or downloaded and played on Android, though I'm not sure why you'd wanna do that, XD

I may be revisiting this in the future to make it more like a Cookie Clicker type of game, with auto punchers and ect.
